summary: The first installment of Ancient Spells is a combination of Fire and Electricity
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever sat down and thought "My character isn't overpowered enough" or "I really wanna see fire and lightning work together"?

[color=#ff0000][size=6]WELL WAIT NO FURTHER[/size][/color]
Now you can kill those nasty drougr with this handy spell!

[color=#00ffff][size=5]How Does It Work?[/size][/color]
Well, I have worked hard to combine Fire and Lightning into one spell. This spell does 60 fire damage and 40 lightning damage. Pretty powerful. This spell is found in a  spell tome.

[color=#00ffff][size=5]Where can I get this spell  tome?[/size][/color]
You can find this spell tome in TWO places. FIRST is Dragonsreach. In Dragonsreach, go into the mage's room and on his desk is a spell tome. Take it. THE NEXT PLACE is in the college of Winterhold. Head into the Hall of Elements and go around the benches until you see a book. This is the book you need.

[color=#00ffff][size=5]What will be next?[/size][/color]
Well. I don't have many plans. It's more of a "Oooh I wanna see this spell happen!" I'll take recommendations into consideration.

[color=#ff0000][size=6]Please download and endorse!

[/size][/color][color=#ff00ff][size=6]Check out my other mods!
[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57527]Flourite's Sword[/url] - A Homestuck Weapon Mod

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77471]Longer Dragon Fights[/url] - Makes Dragons take longer to kill
author: Dewdropcat
